meanings.definition: To build or form in the shape of a pyramid.
meanings.sent1: The kids were pyramiding their building blocks to create a tall tower.
meanings.sent2: The ancient civilization pyramided massive structures as monuments to their gods.
meanings.sent3: The ants were pyramiding their food storage, making a tiny pyramid in the corner.
meanings.sent4: Her dreams pyramided higher and higher, reaching for the stars.
meanings.sent5: The chef skillfully pyramided the fruit slices on the dessert plate.

meanings.sent1: She was pyramiding her savings by adding a little each month.
meanings.sent2: The snow was pyramiding outside, slowly covering everything in white.
meanings.sent3: His excitement was pyramiding as the concert date approached.
meanings.sent4: The tension in the room pyramided, making everyone uneasy.
meanings.sent5: The number of visitors to the museum pyramided after the new exhibit opened.
